snippet.title: Mystery Case Files: Shadow lake
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/1fZWLTR
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/17fXA1m

Uncover the evil legend that haunts a forgotten town in this amazing Collector's Edition. Dive in to the newest addition for the celebrated Mystery Case Files® series, by Big Fish!

• SOMETHING WICKED TOOK OVER THE TOWN OF BITTERFORD
The residents of Bitterford, Maine have fallen prey to a terrible curse. It's up to you to unravel the series of mysterious events that led to the town's downfall and uncover the evil that was responsible.

• UNLOCK THIS COLLECTOR'S EDITION TO ACCESS BONUS CONTENT!
Not only can you experience the thrilling conclusion to this tale, but you will also be able to enjoy behind-the-scenes video, and integrated strategy guide and a chance to find 50 morphing objects scattered throughout the game for a special surprise.

• JOIN FORCES WITH PSYCHIC CASSANDRA WILLIAMS
Played by award-winning actress Lea Thompson, help her to investigate the events that led to the town's destruction and find objects infused with psychic energy!

• EXPOSE THE EVIL THAT LURKS IN THE DEPTHS OF SHADOW LAKE
Solve multi-area hidden object scenes, decipher puzzles, and find matches for 42 Spirit Drawings throughout the game. Beware... what you unearth may haunt you forever.

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
